title: Russian Journalist Masha Gessen Talks Putin and Trump
description: Russian-American Journalist and winner of the National Book Award, Masha Gessen shares her perspective on Presidents Vladimir Putin and Donald Trump and the societies they lead, including the sexual harassment moment in the United States. She discusses her new book, The Future is History: How Totalitarianism Reclaimed Russia, now a National Book Award Winner.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
